Pre-Game Insights: The Golden State Warriors will start their NBA 2024-25 season with an away game at Portland.
The Portland Trail Blazers vs Golden State Warriors game will be played at an iconic Moda center and will have many exciting match ups.
The Portland Trail Blazers though are still evolving with some important pieces already in place.
Team focused on developing the talent along with some experienced players to give them a potent line up.
In head-to-head match-up against the Warriors, the Portland based franchise lost all four matches in the last season and will look for a positive start in the new season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Portland Trail Blazers vs Golden State Warriors game will be played at an iconic Moda center.
The team with a clear game plan and part of their championship core intact will aim for a deep run in the postseason.
The departure of Lillard allowed Simons more time on the ball and is a focal point of scoring for his side.
The star gives an average of 38-40 Dream11 points.
He is a must-have pick for your POR vs GSW Dream11 team.
Ayton has cemented his position as the next ‘big man’ in the league.
He is great with rebounds and creating second-chance opportunities for his team.
Ayton averages close to 34 Dream11 points per game.
He’s a strong pick for today’s matchup.
Anfernee Simons of the Portland Trailblazers is developing in a scoring ‘juggernaut’ for his side.

Others: Stephen Curry will be up for a task with new sharp-shooting partner in Buddy Hield.
